name: BetterSplitLargeMessages
description: Allows larger messages by client-side splitting. No Nitro spoofing. Honors server limits & slowmode, optional chunk cap, hides upsell banners/modals.
author: Pharaoh2k
features: Automatic message splitting for long messages
Smart splitting at natural boundaries (newlines, spaces)
Optional maximum chunks per message cap
Hides Nitro upsell popups and modals
Hard split mode for exact character splitting
